titleStmt.title: SII 14.153: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 153. (A.R. No. 700 of 1916.) ŚĒRMĀDĒVI, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, RĀMASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: This epigraph dated in the 15th year of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Sundara-Chōḷapāṇḍya registers a gift of pieces of land by a certain Parāntakaṉ-Niṟaiñjāṉ alias Diśai-Āyirattaiññūṟṟuva Dasamadi••••• vīraṉ for the maintenance of a watchman (tirumeykāppu) for the temple of Nigariliśōḻa-viṇṇagar-Āḻvār. The donor appears to have belonged to a trading guild as indicated by the name Diśai-Āyirattaiññūṟṟuvaṉ borne by him.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
. svastiśrī [.] koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa śrīcuntaracoḻapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu
10 5Āvatu rājarājappāṇṭi nāṭṭu Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷināṭṭu brahmadeśam ni
karilicoḻac caturvedimaṅkalattu nikarilicoḻaviṇṇakarāḷvārkku tirumeykāppu
kku parāntakaṉ niṟaiñcāṉāṉa ticai Āyirattu Aññūṟṟuva tacamaṭi viraṉukku I
tevatāṉa melpiṭākai śrīkaṇṭavatikku meṟku mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu Uruttiranārācattukku vaṭakku Iraṇa
ñceyil vaṭakkaṭaiya Araimāvu muṉṟāñceyum tevatevecavatikku mekku 9- patāṅ kaṇṇā
ṟṟu Uruttiranārācattukku vaṭakku mutaṟcey ṟai Araimāvaraikkāṇiyāl vaṭakkaṭaiya Araimāvu
m Āka nilam māvu Ivūr teṉmel kaṇṭattu melaipuṟamaṅkalaviti melciṟakil AmThe continuation is lost; the record is incomplete.
Digital edition of SII 14.153 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
